name: Road Trip FRVR - Connect a Way
name_original: Road Trip FRVR - Connect a Way
description:
It's a beautiful day and there’s a long road ahead of you but… Someone has made a mess with all the roadmap parts! Will you use your puzzle solving skills to find the right way and continue the trip? Enjoy a classic pipeline connection theme game with a fun twist and make sure that the car reaches the end of the road! Squeeze your brain and let’s start the Road Trip!


Climb in your car and get ready for a pleasant drive through the countryside! Playing Road Trip FRVR is an addictive puzzle experience based on classic plumbing games where you have to use your logic to correctly connect all the pipeline and let the water flows. But in here you won’t find a pipe connection mess, in here you’ll have to swap parts of a long road in order to line up the roadmap. Solve the maze and let the car continue the trip.

Road Trip offers a fun and relaxing way to unwind while exercising a bit of brainpower. Driving through the forests, mountains, and suburban areas may be a bit of a puzzle, but swapping the right tiles will allow you to keep motoring along. Enjoy an unlimited amount of levels, don’t stop solving new puzzles and get an unbeatable highscore that you can show to your friends! Are you ready for the challenge?

During your travel through this world of puzzles, be sure to pick up the little roadmaps you find along the way because you can use them as a hint! They'll help you move forward with confidence by fitting a part of the highway on the right spot. And don’t worry if you run out of hints, you can get more! There are also bonus gold coins for the taking if you make all the right moves, use them to get some hints packs for those hard levels or you can spend them on new amazing cars like mini-vans, muscle cars or even a tank! Complete a level and train your brain with style!

The road is free of obstructions when you begin, but as you pass through the levels, the scenery and seasons change, and the difficulty of the road maze does. That’s why Road Trip FRVR is a perfect pipe connecting puzzle for all the ages: an educational brainteaser for the children and a relaxing challenge for puzzle experts. Just create the perfect road connection between two points and have a pleasant journey!

Relaxing gameplay that mix pipeline games and classic puzzles with a fresh car-theme twist where all the pieces can be swapped and there’s no need to rotate them, simply pick the tile and drag it to the correct place. Complete some levels in your spread time or train your brain with a really hard stage, you can play as much as you want, there’re unlimited levels! But remember, the road needs to be connected before you can continue!

Road Trip FRVR is a low storage game, you don’t need more than 30 MB to play! This car-themed pipeline connection game only focuses on giving you a truly fun experience in a low mb game size for free. It’s an easy to play road connecting game with incredibly simple and addictive controls, so both young and adults can have fun. Play online or offline, since you don’t need an internet connection to play this car puzzle game. And relax, you can play as much as you want, there’s no time limit!
